title: A brief history of how plastic straws took over the world
body: Learn how plastic straws became ubiquitous in the world's oceans and why some groups are banning them. Explore the history of plastic straws from ancient times to modern inventions, and the environmental impact of their production and use.
readable_content: - The article discusses the history and impact of plastic straws on the environment, explaining their widespread use and subsequent bans. It details the evolution of straws from paper to plastic, emphasizing the shift to plastic due to its affordability and convenience. The article also mentions the increasing pressure on businesses and governments to address plastic pollution, with some advocating for the use of alternatives. (Source: nationalgeographic.com, 2019-01-02)
summary: The article presents a critical view of the impact of plastic straws on the environment and highlights the growing pressure to address plastic pollution. It conveys a sense of urgency and advocacy for the use of alternatives to plastic straws. Overall, the sentiment is supportive of the movement to reduce plastic straw usage. Sentiment: 0.8
